content: The gaming industry is developing at a fast pace and last year there was a huge leap in this area. This was especially noticeable in games related to blockchain technologies, that is, allowing you to spend time not only having fun, but also earning money at the same time. On the wave of hype around NFT and the metaverse, there is a boom in interest in virtual reality games. But I would like to note that there are not so many really interesting and high-quality projects. Of course, the developers of different companies in this field offer many different versions for users of different ages and certain tastes. But still, the majority gravitate towards games of the genre of action and post-apocalypse, so to speak, where the plot develops in the virtual universe of the future.The Project-hive Metaverse is a world, a NEW CYBERPUNK UNIVERSE, where you will fight against other players for in-game currency. Many films have been made on this topic, books have been written and many games have been developed. Everything here is built on the economic component, that is, when you play, you earn money and this allows you to constantly improve your character by buying additional options, competing with other participants. The game itself is free to play and you can buy or sell items obtained in the game, or become a legendary member of the Project-hive metaverse. The basis is monetized content. NFT is your digital property with various features to help you develop and improve your skills in this amazing virtual world.The Hive gaming ecosystem is based on two tokens: HGT (Hive Governance Token) and IGT (Immersion Generation Token) on the SOLANA blockchain.The monetization system offers gamers rewards in several ways, designed to increase the economic sustainability of the Play-to-Earn mechanism. Project Hive is a PvP (Player vs. Player) RPG featuring various NFT items, a clan system, high-quality 3D graphics, and PVE (Player vs. Environment).Examples include rewards for ranking up, simple token ownership, and percentage yield through staking.In-game items that you can collect or trade with other players include various weapons, armor, and other useful in-game features. I want to note that the platform community is growing before our eyes, I’m not afraid of this word, because almost every day I go to the project’s social networks and I’m constantly surprised at how much the community has grown even in a day. Such great interest speaks only in favor of the developers of the platform, who have created a truly revolutionary gaming metaverse. I will acquaint you with the storyline of the game, the main qualities and functionality in the following articles.The platform is planned to be periodically updated to increase functionality, both large-scale additions of new game zones, and small additions to character expansion. If we assume that you are a team player, then it is possible to create your squad from friends or just other players and conduct a cyber battle with other similar teams.Having familiarized myself with all the proposed mechanisms for using the platform, I can say with confidence that professional developers were involved in this and the team consists of high-level specialists with many years of experience in this industry. The philosophical aspect of the site implies the creation of an ecosystem built into the virtual metaverse, providing novelties developed in this area at the moment.And I would like to invite you to get acquainted with the crypto project by visiting the official website and making sure of all the above, as well as learn something new if I missed any details.I am not a financial advisor, much less give financial advice. This is the usual personal opinion of a person. Also not legal advice.
